subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The dispute between the N.H.L. and a new Russian hockey league over forward Alexander Radulov appears headed for court or arbitration after the two leagues failed to agree on Radulov’s status.
snippet: The dispute between the N.H.L. and a new Russian hockey league over forward Alexander Radulov appears headed for court or arbitration after the two leagues failed to agree on Radulov’s status.
